评论详情: This is a Christmas gift for my Granddaughter!
This sweater is straight polyester! It feels so cheap and I ordered the size 7. This would fit my four-year-old.
It piles when you wash it, everything in the dryer sticks to it and the writing on the shirt started to come off. Do not buy.
This sweatshirt was so small it could barely fit my 6 year old
Bought this as a birthday gift for my daughter who choose it and without washing it the silkscreen emblem is peeling off.
My daughter has worn this sweatshirt less than 4-5 times at the very most. It has already very balled up & looks 2-3 years old. Does not wash well with others!
Picky girl loves her new sweatshirt! Soft, good fabric. Washed and didn’t shrink.

I recently bought this girls' sweatshirt and I’m generally happy with it! It's adorable and provides a nice warmth, making it ideal for cooler days. My daughter really enjoys wearing it. The only downside is that the material can snag quite easily, which is somewhat disappointing. Nonetheless, it’s a lovely addition to her closet, and we both love its style and comfort. I would recommend it, but just be mindful of the fabric. I’d give it 4 stars!
